title: SMVV: Courses, Fees, Admission 2024, Cutoff, Ranking, Placements & Scholarships
meta_description: Sri Padmavati Mahila Visvavidyalayam Admission 2024 is open for various courses. Sri Padmavati Mahila Visvavidyalayam Admission is based on national level entrance exam and merit basis. Check latest updates and news on Sri Padmavati Mahila Visvavidyalayam Admission 2024, Cutoff, Courses, Fees, Reviews, Rankings, Placement and other details.

description: The important highlights of SPMVV are provided below:

basic_info.name: SPMVV Courses and Fee
description: SPMVV offers more than 50 courses in streams like Social Sciences, Nursing, Engineering, Vocational Studies, Management, and Pharmacy. BTech, MTech, BSc Nursing, MPharm, BPharm, MBA, BSc, MSc, MA, MEd, LLM, etc. are some of the popular courses at the university. Admissions are made based on merit or entrance examination score as per the university's decision. Various courses are offered in Distance Learning mode. Detailed information about the SPMVV Courses and Fees is tabulated below:

basic_info.name: SPMVV Admissions
description: Admissions at SPMVV for UG, PG, PhD, MPhil courses are done online. The government university accepts state and university-level entrance tests to admit students across 50+ programs. Once the aspirant applies online, they must wait for the university to release the merit lists of the shortlisted students. Upon shortlisting, students must appear for the on-campus counseling and document verification. Once completed, students can proceed further with online fee payment and confirm the admission.
Aspirants can follow the below-mentioned steps to apply to SPMVV courses and programs

description: SPMVV Cutoff 2024 for various is yet to be released. Admission to MBA, MTech and BTech based on national-level entrance exams such as ICET, AP PGECET, and AP-EAMCET. Candidates clearing the cutoff rank in the respective entrance exam will be offered admission to the college through counselling.

basic_info.name: SPMVV Placements 2024
description: SPMVV has a dedicated placement cell that conducts annual placement drives and regular activities. Major recruiters are TCS, Internshala, and Amazon. The university's long-term internship program provides a remarkable placement rate, with 70-80% of students securing employment opportunities.

Students who are academically strong or financially weak can benefit from the scholarships. Financial aid is subject to availability and is not guaranteed. faqs.question: Is SPMVV a private institution?
faqs.answer: Ans. No, SPMVV is a state university established in 1983 by NT. Rama Rao for empowerment of women. The university was founded under the Sri Padmavati Mahila Visvavidyalayam Act of 1983, which became effective on April 14, 1983.

faqs.question: How can an individual get a seat at SPMVV?
faqs.answer: Sri Padmavati Mahila Visvavidyalayam (SPMVV) admits students to all courses based on their performance in the previous qualifying examination or an entrance test held at the state/national level. Some of the popular courses offered include BPharm, MPharm, MBA, MA, MEd, BEd, BSc Nursing, GNM, BTech, MTech, BSc, MSc, MPhil, and PhD.

faqs.question: What are the facilities available at SPMVV?
faqs.answer: Ans. SPMVV offers its students world-class infrastructure. Some of the major facilities offered are as follows:HostelLibrarySports FacilitiesLaboratoriesCafeteriaSmart ClassroomsSeminar Halls

faqs.question: How many schools and apartments does SPMVV have?
faqs.answer: SPMVV offers admissions to 50+ undergraduate, graduate, doctoral, and master's programs based on merit and entrance exam scores. These courses are offered in various departments. The government university has, in total, five schools of education. They are:School of NursingSchool of Social SciencesSchool of Engineering and Technology, andInstitute of Pharmaceutical Technology

faqs.question: What partnerships does SPMVV have?
faqs.answer: Due to its numerous worldwide partnerships, SPMVV offers students greater exposure to other students. Applied mathematics at Penn State University in the United States; and Hanze University in the Netherlands are a few of the partnerships.

faqs.question: Does SPMVV offer its students travel services?
faqs.answer: Yes, SPMVV offers faculty and student transport services. The university provides transport services to drop off and pick up students and faculty at different locations.

faqs.question: Is their recognition for SPMVV?
faqs.answer: The University Grants Commission (UGC) recognizes Sri Padmavati Mahila Visvavidyalayam. SPMMV is ranked in the 151–200 range of the NIRF ranking 2022. It is one of the best universities in South India that offers women's education in various subjects.

faqs.question: Does SPMVV accept the JEE score?
faqs.answer: Yes, it also accepts JEE results for admission to BTech programs. Rankings in JEE Mains, Andhra Pradesh EAMCET, TS EAMCET, or any state-level eligibility test, as well as marks in BIE or equivalent in the specified order of preference, are used to determine admission to Sri Padmavati Mahila Vishvavidyalay.

faqs.question: Is SPMVV as excellent as Christ University?
faqs.answer: Both Christ University and Sri Padmavati Mahila Visvavidyalayam (SPMVV) are renowned universities yet have different goals and areas of expertise. SPMVV is a women's university that provides a diverse range of undergraduate and postgraduate programs in many fields.

faqs.question: What is SSPMVV's faculty strength?
faqs.answer: When Sri Padmavati Mahila Visvavidyalayam was opened, it had ten faculties, three hundred students, and twenty employees. Nowadays, approximately 4000 students attend the SPMMV, and its academic team consists of 105 teachers and 131 academic consultants.

faqs.question: Which entrance exams are accepted for PG courses at SPMVV?
faqs.answer: The entrance exams accepted for PG courses at SPMVV are as follows:CourseEntrance ExamMAMerit BasedMEdScore in SPMVV CETMScScore in SPMVV CETMComScore in SPMVV CETMTechScore in AP PGECETMBAScore in ICETMPharmScore in GPAT/PGECETMPhilSPMVV Entrance Test followed by an Interview

Section.name: About SPMVV
Section.description:
Sri Padmavati Mahila Visvavidyalayam (Sri Padmavati University) is a state-level university located in Tirupati, Andhra Pradesh. Founded in 1983 by Sri N.T.Rama Rao, then-chief minister of Andhra Pradesh, with the aim to train female students to be better nation-builders. The university was founded under the Sri Padmavati Mahila Visvavidyalayam Act of 1983, which became effective on April 14, 1983.
Sri Padmavati Mahila Visvavidyalayam's campus spans 138.43 acres of lovely green area. SPMVV has four schools: the School of Sciences, the School of Social Sciences, Humanities and Management, the School of Nursing, and the School of Engineering and Technology. It has been ranked the 33rd best college by India Today Ranking 2024. The university has been accredited with a Grade 'A' by the National Assessment and Accreditation Council (NAAC).
SPMVV offers undergraduate, postgraduate, and doctoral courses in the fields of pharmacy, management, engineering and nursing. BPharm, MPharm, MBA, MA, BSc Nursing, BTech and MTech are the major courses offered by SPMVV. The university also offers distance education programs under its Directorate of Distance Education. The state university accepts university and state-level entrance exam scores such as GPAT, APPGCET, EAMCET, and PGECET. SPMVV placement cell offers reputable placement packages to its students. Some of the top recruiters of the government university are Amazon, HCL, Cognizant, Infosys, and more. The highest CTC offered at SPMVV annual placement drives is INR 9.6 - INR 10 LPA.
Table of Content

Upon shortlisting, students must appear for the on-campus counseling and document verification. Once completed, students can proceed further with online fee payment and confirm the admission.

Ques. Is SPMVV a private institution?
Ans. No, SPMVV is a state university established in 1983 by NT. Rama Rao for empowerment of women. The university was founded under the Sri Padmavati Mahila Visvavidyalayam Act of 1983, which became effective on April 14, 1983.
Ques. How can an individual get a seat at SPMVV?
Ans. Sri Padmavati Mahila Visvavidyalayam (SPMVV) admits students to all courses based on their performance in the previous qualifying examination or an entrance test held at the state/national level. Some of the popular courses offered include BPharm, MPharm, MBA, MA, MEd, BEd, BSc Nursing, GNM, BTech, MTech, BSc, MSc, MPhil, and PhD.
Ques. What are the facilities available at SPMVV?
Ans. SPMVV offers its students world-class infrastructure. Some of the major facilities offered are as follows:
Ques. How many schools and apartments does SPMVV have?
Ans. SPMVV offers admissions to 50+ undergraduate, graduate, doctoral, and master's programs based on merit and entrance exam scores. These courses are offered in various departments. The government university has, in total, five schools of education. They are:
Ques. What partnerships does SPMVV have?
Ans. Due to its numerous worldwide partnerships, SPMVV offers students greater exposure to other students. Applied mathematics at Penn State University in the United States; and Hanze University in the Netherlands are a few of the partnerships.
Ques. Does SPMVV offer its students travel services?
Ans. Yes, SPMVV offers faculty and student transport services. The university provides transport services to drop off and pick up students and faculty at different locations.
Ques. Is their recognition for SPMVV?
Ans. The University Grants Commission (UGC) recognizes Sri Padmavati Mahila Visvavidyalayam. SPMMV is ranked in the 151–200 range of the NIRF ranking 2022. It is one of the best universities in South India that offers women's education in various subjects.
Ques. Does SPMVV accept the JEE score?
Ans. Yes, it also accepts JEE results for admission to BTech programs. Rankings in JEE Mains, Andhra Pradesh EAMCET, TS EAMCET, or any state-level eligibility test, as well as marks in BIE or equivalent in the specified order of preference, are used to determine admission to Sri Padmavati Mahila Vishvavidyalay.
Ques. Is SPMVV as excellent as Christ University?
Ans. Both Christ University and Sri Padmavati Mahila Visvavidyalayam (SPMVV) are renowned universities yet have different goals and areas of expertise. SPMVV is a women's university that provides a diverse range of undergraduate and postgraduate programs in many fields.
Ques. What is SSPMVV's faculty strength?
Ans. When Sri Padmavati Mahila Visvavidyalayam was opened, it had ten faculties, three hundred students, and twenty employees. Nowadays, approximately 4000 students attend the SPMMV, and its academic team consists of 105 teachers and 131 academic consultants.
Ques. Which entrance exams are accepted for PG courses at SPMVV?
Ans. The entrance exams accepted for PG courses at SPMVV are as follows:
